public_pdfs.title: Module 1 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Complete coverage of telecommunication systems, including signal processing, modulation techniques, network protocols, and emerging technologies.

public_pdfs.title: Module 2 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Digital and analog communication, error correction, wireless technologies, and the future of telecommunications in a comprehensive guide.

public_pdfs.title: Module 3 : MDM - Fundamentals of Telecommunication Systems
public_pdfs.description: Cellular networks, satellite communication, network security, and the impact of 5G and beyond on global connectivity.

public_pdfs.title: Module 2 : Computational Theory
public_pdfs.description: Automata theory, formal languages, Turing machines, decidability, and complexity classes for a comprehensive understanding of computation.

public_pdfs.title: Module 3 : Computational Theory
public_pdfs.description: Advanced topics in computational theory, including NP-completeness, approximation algorithms, and the latest research in computational complexity.

premium_pdfs.title: Machine Learning: Complete Guide
premium_pdfs.description: Supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement learning. Neural networks, SVMs, clustering, and model evaluation strategies.

premium_pdfs.title: Advanced Calculus & Real Analysis
premium_pdfs.description: Rigorous treatment of limits, continuity, differentiation, integration, and metric spaces for advanced students.

premium_pdfs.title: Quantum Mechanics
premium_pdfs.description: Wave-particle duality, Schr√∂dinger equation, quantum states, operators, and perturbation theory.

premium_pdfs.title: Database Systems Design
premium_pdfs.description: Relational models, SQL, normalization, transactions, indexing, query optimization, and NoSQL databases.

premium_pdfs.title: Advanced Biochemistry
premium_pdfs.description: Protein structure, enzyme kinetics, metabolic pathways, DNA replication, and gene expression in depth.

premium_pdfs.title: Microeconomics & Game Theory
premium_pdfs.description: Consumer theory, market structures, Nash equilibrium, auction theory, and welfare economics.
